text: Salbah () is a village in Jabal Nimr. It is located in the Hajjah Governorate, According to the 2004 census it had a population of 945 people. ==External links== *Towns and villages in the Al Hudaydah Governorate *National Information Center in Yemen ==References== Category:Populated places in Hajjah Governorate Category:Port cities in the Arabian Peninsula Category:Port cities and towns of the Red Sea
title: Salbah
